verses.roman:
āsi' sei durgā-maṇḍape vāsā kaila
avadhya vadha kari' māṁsa se-ghare rāndhāila

synonyms: āsi'-coming; sei durgā-maṇḍape—at that very place of the Durgā-maṇḍapa; vāsā kaila—made his residence; avadhya—a cow or calf, which is not to be killed; vadha kari'-killing; māṁsa—meat; se-ghare—in that place; rāndhāila—cooked.
translation: The Mohammedan minister made his residence in the Durgā-maṇḍapa of Rāmacandra Khān. He killed a cow and cooked the meat at that very place.
